replies.body:
I'm a simple board member. 

I see Avatar or Korra, I upvote.

http://i.imgur.com/R9y7jjV.gif[IMG]
New passive. Gailo starts off with -500 gold. To pay for collateral damage.
If that is so, should Graves start in jail?
Mundo chooses his initial spawn point!

> [{quoted}](name=0 oxros piratis,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Vx2OuYcF,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-03-08T20:13:01.390+0000)
>
> If that is so, should Graves start in jail?

unless he has his Jailbreak skin on. then yes.
and this is why heroes remain incognito, to avoid paying for the damage they cause while trying to save things
Sigh... this is the third time this week...

> [{quoted}](name=decadeXD,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Vx2OuYcF,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-03-08T01:08:13.223+0000)
>
> Ultraman Mebius

I remember watching that as a six year old...

Japanese kids TV is a lot more violent than American Pleb stuff.

Upvoted for Ultraman 

That was my childhood
